fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose another target at night. You will intercept and redirect their attackers to yourself.
- Spend a night increasing your Defense level, which will apply to the following night. (2 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Basic Defense
- All of your defense increases may only increase your defense up to Invincible tier.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- 1 use Powerful Defense
- When you use the Factional Attack, your Defense will increase for that night.
